Articles.Content:
Hungry Lemmings eat all the gelato before jumping off a cliff.

Picked clean hill.

IT HAS BEEN REVIVED!

The hill is no longer selected.

Unpicked Clean Hill

Pick axe.

Pickaxe Hill.

~~Pick~~  axe

Axe hill

Playing in bedrock edition

Sword hill

**Edited <time datetime="2023-08-13T23:42:40Z" title="08/13/2023 11:42  PM" data-short="Aug 13">August 13, 2023</time> by JNSQFan**
  
java better

S-word is filtered.

Word Hill

Banned for using s word.

Banned hill.

The ban expires.

Unbanned Hill.

People move in.

Urban Hill.

The industrial revolution re-occured.

Industrial Hill

Dust is driven out.

Outdustrial Hill

Money also goes out.

Poor outdustrial hill.

Poor and pure.

Pure Poor Dustrial Hill.

But not pure enough to voluntarily sweep the floor once in a while. Dust comes in again.

Pure Poor Dust-rial hill

The dusty hill reminds you of Duna.

Pure Poor Dune.

Dune buggies arrive.

Sand driving fun hill.

A software, full of bugs.

Klendathu Hill.

Klan Dathu retake the hill.

Feud Mountain.

Special forces are deployed and take the hill by force.

Militarized hill.

**Edited <time datetime="2023-08-17T16:32:35Z" title="08/17/2023 04:32  PM" data-short="Aug 17">August 17, 2023</time> by TwoCalories**

The hill is rushed by frenzied toddlers.

Mini terrors hill.

A kindergarten is built nearby, so parents take their children there

Parents hill

The children grow up and become adults which take over the hill.

Grown-up-kids hill

The Marines come back and take the hill swiftly and nonviolently.

Militarized hill.

**Edited <time datetime="2023-08-18T16:00:01Z" title="08/18/2023 04:00  PM" data-short="Aug 18">August 18, 2023</time> by TwoCalories**

A small paper with a title "The Geneva Conventions" falls on the hill. The entire army is scared and runs away.

A hill, controlled by some paper

An origami specialist comes and folds the paper intricately.

Paper Tiger Hill.
